attributes.action: To create and implement a policy to prevent,screen,treat and aftercare for Gambling Addiction in the Armed Services Bill to reduce Gambling Related De
attributes.additional_details:
US veterans research and Australian Defence Forces  is now demonstrating that Gambling Addiction is four times the rates that the general public  have and has a overall and individual negative affect on Armed Services.
To ackowledge and investigate further the steps that need to be taken to address this issue.
